job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: pstrongThis position may be based in Santa Ana CA or our NEW Austin TX office that will be opening later this year Flexible hybrid work schedulestrongppbrppSureCo is a strongPURPOSEstrong driven company thats dedicated to disrupting our broken healthcare system Were 100 focused on driving down the cost of healthcare and improving the quality of care for all of us SureCo and its subsidiaries and partners are at the forefront of health care change in the US Serving patients consumers and enterprises We focus on innovative technologies new care paradigms all focused on aligning our incentives with our customers Established in 2016 weve grown from 10 to over 100 and counting Sureconians  what we call our awesome team membersppnbspppIf you are looking for a company focused on making real change highenergy and teamdriven performance then youve found it here at SureCo Our people are inspiring and are inspired by what we do who we get to do it with and who we do it forppnbspppstrongnbspWere Idealistsnbspstrong Who says healthcare cant have heroesppnbspstrongWe Put People Firstnbspstrong Theyre not just customers Theyre our collaborators in creating more human healthcareppnbspstrongWe Simplifystrongnbsp Healthcare should cure headaches Not create themppnbspstrongWe Disruptnbspstrong This isnt healthcare as usual Forget status quo welcome to the era of Engaged HealthcareppnbspppstrongHow Will YOU Make an ImpactstrongppnbspppAs astrongnbspData Engineerstrong you will own and lead SureCos Data Platform You will have the opportunity to oversee custom data platform to support our web mobile application and largescale business intelligence solutions within the healthcare and health insurance space You will work closely with our analytics and engineering teams to implement solutions to answer complex questions and drive business decisionsppstrongnbspstrongppstrongTake the team to the next level and continue to develop your leadership skills with our endless growth opportunitiesstrongppbrppbrppstronguKey contributions will includeustrongpulliArchitect review and implement Database schema for Health care mobile and web applications in Postgres SQLliliDevelop modern data architectural approaches for business intelligence reporting and analytics including that for machine learning models and data science ensuring effectiveness scalability and reliabilityliliDesign develop implement and optimize ELT processes that merge data from disparate sources into Snowflake for consumption by data analysts and scientists business owners and decisions makersliliDetect data quality issues identify their root causes implement fixes and design data audits to capture issuesliliDistill technical requirements into the product development and operational process via continuous collaboration with product engineering and analytics team membersliliInfluence and collaborate with all levels of stakeholders including analysts developers and business usersliliGather and build canned and ad hoc reports using Reporting and visualization tools like Power BIAWS QuickSightliliImplement security bestpractices and other compliance requirementsliliAble to anticipate problems and proactively develop appropriate solutions for our Data teamliulpbrppstronguRequirementsustrongpulliBS degree in Computer Science  Computer Engineering or related fieldlili5 years of relevant work experienceliliStrong problem solving and coding skills in SQLPythonliliExperience working with a variety of ETL platforms FiveTran AWS Glue or MatillionliliExperience with Snowflake PostgresSQL MSSQL and NOSQLliliExperience with AirflowPrefectliliExperience with Amazon SageMaker and ECSEKS is a plusliliHandson leadership influence and development of all things data servicesliliHands on experience with AWSliliAdvanced knowledge with database design RDBMSamp NoSQLliliScrum  Agile working environment preferredliliAdvanced knowledge in Python and SnowflakeliliExperience with CICD including CICD for database developmentliliExcellent interpersonal communication initiative teamwork and problemsolving skillsliulpbrppstronguWHY SURECOustrongpulliWorklife balance and hybrid work scheduleliliAbility to make a difference to the Healthcare industryliliMedical Vision DentalliliAnnual allowance and reimbursement for employee healthrelated expenseslili401k  Company Match Dollar for Dollar up to 3liliGenerous Paid Time Off Paid Holidays and Company Paid Ancillary benefits Basic Life Shortterm and Longterm disability insuranceliliCompany Covered Telemedicine and Virtual Visits for employeesliliEmployee Assistance ProgramliliCasual Dress AttireliliMonthly celebrations and team eventsliliConcierge Services such as atmosphereliulpnbspppSureCo is an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity gender expression national origin protected veteran status or any other basis protected by applicable law and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disabilityppnbspp
